MonitorTypeState.Comment: Some not allowed chipers are enabled.

DisplayString.Name: Weak Security Connection Monitor
DisplayString.Description: Alerts is target resource supports a weak security protocol.

DisplayString.Name: Connection Security Weak
DisplayString.Description: Secure connection to the '{0}' web resource at the {1} address may be weak. The resource supports {2} protocols, while only {3} protocols are allowed.

DisplayString.Name: Required Security Protocols Enabled Monitor
DisplayString.Description: When enabled ensures that target resource supports required security protocols..

DisplayString.Name: Required Security Protocol Not Supported
DisplayString.Description: Secure connection to the '{0}' web resource at the {1} address may be not possible because the resource doesn't support all required protocols. The resource supports {2} protocols, while {3} protocols are required.

DisplayString.Name: DNS Name Resolution Monitor
DisplayString.Description: Resolves host name using system-configured DNS servers or custom set of DNS servers.

DisplayString.Name: Unable To Resolve Host Name
DisplayString.Description: DNS name resolution failed (Critical) or partially failed (Warning) for the host portion of the {0} URL of the '{1}' web resource. The following DNS servers were used during the test: {2}. Detected errors were: {3}.
